Join WoofWatch

Dogs have always roamed the stars: a utopian species sniffing out worlds worth saving. When they discovered Earth, they embedded sleeper pups in case danger struck.

Now, in sun-soaked Pastel City, a rogue AI called S.A.M. has broken free. As the last activated agent of WoofWatch, you’re a rookie pup in a mech suit - ready to guard humanity and prove that hope still has teeth.

Features

Unleash 12 heroic dogs, each packing a signature Super Ability

Sniff out a diverse cast of enemies, each with unique mechanics to master

Fetch gear with unique effects, combining into chaotic synergies

Track down S.A.M.’s Memory Cores to uncover its secrets

Confront bosses born from dogs’ greatest fears — vacuums included

Roam 5 handcrafted, ever-changing roguelike levels

Media
